title: Ghost 2003 DOS Bootable for USB
description:
Norton Ghost 2003.

This version is a ~1mb executable file for DOS mode bootable Ghost 2003.
It is most useful on USB sticks with multiple tools, and saves time instead of switching between CD's or burning ISOs.

Best tool for Drive cloning/imaging for XP and older Windows Operating Systems.

It also comes with an optional tool to make a USB stick bootable DOS if you don't have one already.
